definitions: A group of similar buildings or facilities on the same site.
A related group of emotionally significant ideas that are completely or partly repressed and that cause psychic conflict leading to abnormal mental states or behavior.
A whole that comprehends multiple parts, especially in chemistry referring to a compound in which independently existing molecules or ions are held together by coordinate bonds.
examples: He struggles with a complex about his height.
The chemical complexes reacted differently under pressure.
